alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 7:11PM CDT until June 03 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Louisiana and northwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, in north central Louisiana, Grant and Winn. In northwest Louisiana, Natchitoches. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Natchitoches, Colfax, Montgomery, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Melrose, Bermuda, Cloutierville, Cypress, St. Maurice, Chopin, Flora, Aloha, Bellwood, Gorum, Grand Ecore, Clear Lake and Lake Iatt.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
